Question: This person received the 1961 Golden Globe Award as "World Film Favorite" in March 1962, five months before her death.
Hints: This person married James Dougherty on June 19, 1942, at the home of Chester Howell in Los Angeles.
By this time, this person had only completed one film, Bus Stop, under her four-picture contract with 20th Century Fox.
In July 2010, this person's Brentwood home was put up for sale by Prudential California Realty.
